title: Unitary has no formal split in central and local

content.question: A unitary system is best defined as one that has

choices.label: fusion of powers between the executive and legislative branches
no constitutional division of powers between the central and regional governments

content.answer: no constitutional division of powers between the central and regional governments

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
